attr.name: buttonRadius
attr.description: define the radius of the button

attr.name: horizontal
attr.description: Whether to render horizontally

attr.name: buttonIcon
attr.description: Id of resource to use for button

attr.name: buttonThickness
attr.description: thickness of button (only used if buttonIcon not specified)

attr.name: backgroundColor
attr.description: color to use for back ground (only used if no background image specified)

attr.name: buttonColor
attr.description: color of button (only ised when buttonIcon not specified)

attr.name: direction
attr.description: direction to draw (default left-to-right)

attr.name: meterColor
attr.description: default bar color to render the bars when not part of the meter. default black.

attr.name: meterTotal
attr.description: total number of bars in the meter. default 8

attr.name: meterPoor
attr.description: number of bars for low. renders in poorColor. default 1/3 of total.

attr.name: poorColor
attr.description: color to render when poor. default red

attr.name: meterFair
attr.description: number of bars for fair. renders in fairColor. default 2/3 of total

attr.name: fairColor
attr.description: color to render when fair. default yellow

attr.name: goodColor
attr.description: color to render when good (bars > fair). default green

attr.name: textView
attr.description: optional id to text view to show precise meter value

attr.name: meterMaxValue
attr.description: max value of meter. default 1.0

attr.name: meterValue
attr.description: initial value for the meter. default 0

attr.name: rounded
attr.description: set to true to render bars with rounded edges. default is false.

attr.name: drawable
attr.description: drawable to use for bars. Overrides rounded. default is none

attr.name: meterThickness
attr.description: thickness of a single meter bar

attr.name: meterSpacing
attr.description: Space inbetween bars

attr.name: meterStyle
attr.description: All bars are rendered in the same color depending on meter value default (onecolor)

attr.name: animatePeaks
attr.description: When true, peaks are animated, meaning they fall off gradually

attr.name: dominantSide
attr.description: choose how to compute the square

attr.name: textCenterAngle
attr.description: angle in degrees of the center of the text along the circle

attr.name: textDirectionReverse
attr.description: Render the text from RtoL

attr.name: dotDimension
attr.description: The width/height of a dot. If not set then the dimension is computed based on layout constraints.

attr.name: pageCount
attr.description: Indicate the number of pages to represent

attr.name: pagePadding
attr.description: Spacing as a fraction of the indicator dimension. Defaults to 0.5 (one half of the indicator dimension)

attr.name: pageColorOn
attr.description: Color to use to draw indicator when on, or tint the drawable when present. Default to white.

attr.name: pageColorOff
attr.description: Color to use to draw indicator when off, or tint the drawable when present. Default to %50 alpha of pageColorOn

attr.name: viewPagerId
attr.description: Reference to the view pager to track (default empty - must be done in code)
